text: hey everyone today I'll be giving a
brief introduction to some updates with
AWS Key Management Service or AWS KMS in
this video we'll be talking about some
flexibility visibility and pricing
improvements regarding AWS KMS automatic
key rotation I've also linked in the
description a blog post describing the
changes to KMS key rotation in more
detail automatic key rotation is only
supported for either AWS managed or
customer managed symmetric Keys
generated in KMS it is not supported for
imported Keys asymmetric Keys hash based
message authentication keys or Keys
generated in a AWS Cloud HSM cluster
using the AWS KMS custom key store
feature all right let's
begin previously KMS only offered a
fixed anual rotation period for
automatic key rotation however customers
voed the need for shorter and customer
rotation periods we now offer the
ability to customize the frequency of a
KMS key rotation period between 90 days
to
2555 days or 7 years depending on your
specific use case and compliance needs
this period can be adjusted at any point
which will reset the time when rotation
will take effect however existing keys
with rotation enabled will continue to
rotate every year you will also be able
to rotate your KMS key on demand either
through the AWS Management console for
AWS KMS the AWS command line interface
or with the rotate key on demand API for
each KMS key there's a lifetime limit of
10 on demand rotations per key if you're
testing or validating instant key
rotation we recommend deleting the test
keys and generating new ones
instead another added feature is the
ability to view the DAT of key rotation
events customers like you have asked for
better visibility in validating KMS key
rotations for enhanced audibility and
simplified compliance purposes which is
why you can now access every previous
rotation for a KMS key with the
scheduled or on demand rotation via the
AWS Management console for KMS or the
new key rotations API finally here at
AWS we're always trying to optimize cost
for our customers and so we're happy to
announce that we're introducing a price
reduction on rotated keys in the past
each annual KMS rotation added $1 per
month to the key cost as of May 2024 for
every KMS key rotated automatically or
on demand the first and second rotation
of the key will add $1 per month in cost
per rated hourly but further rotations
past that will be built therefore the
total cost of a key will fall between $1
a month per key to a maximum cost of $3
a month per key per rated hourly this
reduction will affect all keys including
previously created ones and existing
customers that have KMS keys with three
or more rotations will see this change
reflected in their KMS cost okay now
that we've gone over all that let's see
this play out in action on the AWS
Management console first I'll
demonstrate creating a KMS key with a
custom key rotation period I'll open Key
Management Service and start with
creating my own customer manage key
we'll choose symmetric since we've
already established that key rotation
isn't enabled for asymmetric keys I'll
leave this rest of the settings default
since we won't need to change any of
that okay for the name I'll call this
sample rotate key the name's already
pretty self-explanatory to some but we
can also specify here in the description
that it's a sample key to demonstrate
rotation okay for the purpose of this
demo we'll give administrator access
just to users with the admin rule but in
practice we recommend following the
principle of lease privilege and only
giving access to those who need it same
goes for the key usage
permissions okay looks
good now that we've created our key we
can click on its Alias here in the KMS
console and go to key rotation as you
can see key rotation is disabled so
let's change that by enabling
it and we can choose a rotation period
of 90 days wow would you look at that
we've now enabled key rotation so that
the next rotation is scheduled for 90
days from now again this number can
Chang at any time if we go back to the
edit button and change that number now
let's say I want to automatically rotate
the key right now you'll see that I can
do just that by clicking this button
that says rotate now under the on demand
key rotation section you'll also notice
that since I just created this key
there's 10 on demand key rotations left
so let me just click this and there we
go we just rotated it and that should in
turn change the number on this section
which if we scroll down list our key
rotation history so as you can see we
know that our rotation was successful
because it was displayed on the screen
right here and that's a wrap today we
created a key with a custom key rotation
period rotated It On Demand and had
visibility into the rotation process
thanks for keeping up with me so far and
if you have any questions make sure to
check the AWS Key Management Service
documentation I have linked Below in the
description all right bye
